channel.title: How do I make People Drop Items on death?
channel.description: hey im very new to coding but ive got the basic things down. But im stuck I cant make people drop their items on death. I've tested it with mods ..admins..owners and regulars but all of them keep items on death. Please help.

hey im very new to coding but ive got the basic things down. But im stuck I cant make people drop their items on death. I’ve tested it with mods …admins…owners and regulars but all of them keep items on death. Please help.
